By using Dark, Psychic, and Fighting Gems the Black Flute increases the player's Click Attack. == Details == Black Flute increases the player's Click Attack by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%.
